languages.text: "Я дам тебе шанс оправдать хотя бы часть твоих деяний".
"I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."
languages.original_text: "Я дам тебе шанс оправдать хотя бы часть твоих деяний".

traits.locale_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."
"I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."
"I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."
"I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."

languages.text: “我愿意给你这个机会，让你弥补你犯下的一小部分罪孽。”
languages.original_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意给你这个机会，让你弥补你犯下的一小部分罪孽。”

languages.text: «Le daré la oportunidad de justificar aunque sea solo parte de lo que ha hecho».
languages.original_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."

traits.locale_text: «Le daré la oportunidad de justificar aunque sea solo parte de lo que ha hecho».

languages.text: 「自分の行いを少しでも正当化する機会を与えてやろう」
languages.original_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の行いを少しでも正当化する機会を与えてやろう」

languages.text: « Je vous donne une chance de justifier ne serait-ce qu'une petite partie de vos forfaits. »
languages.original_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous donne une chance de justifier ne serait-ce qu'une petite partie de vos forfaits. »

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch die Chance, selbst einen kleinen Teil Eurer Taten zu rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch die Chance, selbst einen kleinen Teil Eurer Taten zu rechtfertigen."

languages.text: "İşlediğin suçların bir kısmını da olsa telafi etme şansını vereceğim sana."
languages.original_text: "I shall give you a chance to justify even some small portion of your deeds."
